root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 3-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

This indicator is available for countries from 1990 (or earlier depending on the availability of empirical data for each country before 1990) to 2019.

Disaggregation:

Disaggregation is available by sex, age (neonatal, infant, child) and wealth quintile.
